content: शद् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (but <ab>A.</ab> in conjugational tenses) शीयते, शन्न {@--1@} To fall, perish, decay, wither. {@--2@} To go. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} शादयति-ते {@--1@} To cause to go, impel. {@--2@} शातयति-ते ({%a%}) To fell, throw down, cut down; किं भूभृत्कटकस्थितिव्यसनिना व्यर्थं खुराः शातिताः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 14. 80</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">15. 24</ls>, ({%b%}) To kill, destroy. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> ( शदति) To go (usually with आ).
